products.title: Classic Wooden Dining Table
products.description: Solid wood dining table with a polished mahogany finish, comfortably seats six people.

products.title: Minimalist Wooden Coffee Table
products.description: Sleek and modern coffee table with a smooth walnut finish, ideal for minimal living rooms.

products.title: Rustic Wooden Armchair
products.description: A handcrafted armchair made of solid oak wood, perfect for rustic or farmhouse interiors.

products.title: Vintage Wooden Bookshelf
products.description: Elegant bookshelf made from reclaimed teak wood, featuring 4 spacious shelves.

products.title: Scandinavian Style Wooden Bed Frame
products.description: A low-profile bed frame made of pine wood with a natural finish, perfect for modern bedrooms.

products.title: Aesthetic Wooden Wall Shelf
products.description: Floating wall shelf crafted from oak wood, adds style and storage to any room.
